title: Asymptomatic Omicron spread, cause for concern
content: The Ministry of Health stated that the spread of the Omicron virus is increasing through asymptomatic COVID-19 infections.Deputy Director-General of Public Health Services, Dr. Hemantha Herath, said that the death toll from COVID-19 infections has already risen as a result.Meanwhile, 1217 COVID-19 patients have been identified on Wednesday (16).Furthermore, the total number of COVID-19 deaths recorded so far in the country is 15,899.The Ministry of Health stated that 596,042 COVID-19 patients have been recovered so far.
